member.name: T:Jundroo.ModTools.Editor.MonoCecilTools
member.summary: A collection of utilities and tools that make use of Mono.Cecil.

member.name: M:Jundroo.ModTools.Editor.MonoCecilTools.AddOrUpdateUnityAPICompatibilityVersionAttribute(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds or updates the attribute to the assembly at the specified path.
member.param: The path of the assembly to update.
The version number to pass to the attribute constructor.

member.name: M:Jundroo.ModTools.Editor.MonoCecilTools.DetermineLoadOrder(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Determines the load order of the specified assemblies paths such that an assembly with a reference to another assembly in the same list will not be loaded before the referenced assembly.
member.returns: An ordered list of assembly paths. The order of assemblies in the list should be such that an assembly should not come before another assembly that it references.

member.name: M:Jundroo.ModTools.Editor.MonoCecilTools.GetAssemblyReferenceNames(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the assembly reference names.
member.param: The path of the assembly to examine.
member.returns: The list of assembly reference names.

member.name: M:Jundroo.ModTools.Editor.MonoCecilTools.RemoveAssemblyReferences(System.String,System.Func{Mono.Cecil.AssemblyNameReference,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Removes assembly references matching the specified condition from the assembly at the specified path.
member.param: The path of the assembly to update.
The condition for references to remove. A reference is removed if returning true and ignored if false.

member.summary: A custom assembly resolver for mono.cecil.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
